txt.en: 'Always good to see you, [placeholder]. We have just received a disturbing report. A prominent Umbari noble has vanished during a routine trip to Shedax Khîn in the Shield Isles, near an isle where it's rumoured the dead walk freely. Please, we need your help. Investigate and rescue any trapped sailors.'
You have defeated the dead and rescued the prisoners! Return with the Umbari scout to the mission giver with this report.
There is no twist in this mission.
You have been tasked with investigating what happened in the Shedax Khîn in the Shield Isles, and to rescue any trapped sailors.
'Well that is quite the story. I am so glad you were there to take on the dead and ensure the crew's safety. Thank you for everything you've done.'
'Your objective is clear, [placeholder], investigate what happened in the Shedax Khîn in the Shield Isles, and rescue any trapped sailors. The hopes of the vanished crew rest with you.'
Your mission is to investigate what happened in the Shedax Khîn in the Shield Isles, and rescue any trapped sailors.\n\nSpeak to Deshra to travel.
